Continuous Formula

f(i) = f(0) × pow(ratio, i/n) within discrete octaves
Uses the mathematical formula within discrete octaves of 5 elements each. Each octave doubles the starting value, with continuous progression within each octave.

Classic Typographic Scale

Discrete octaves with harmonic ratios
Uses discrete octaves of 5 elements each, with specific harmonic ratios: 7/6, 4/3, 3/2, 7/4. Each octave doubles the starting value.
